edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor.commandSupport

Class AccountInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor.commandSupport.AccountInfo

  • public class AccountInfo
extends Object
    Stores the Human Readable Name (HRN), GUID for an account plus other stuff we need to keep like a password, aliases and additional guids. This class handles the conversion to and from JSON objects as well as conversion to the format which can be store in the database. The account can have multiple aliases which are extra HRNs. The account can also have additional associated GUIDs. For certain things we also keep an encrypted password.
    Author:
    westy
